TABLE.TITLE: Play Time Limits
TABLE.LIMIT_AFFECT: This new limit will take affect on

POP_UP_DIALOG.TIME_LIMIT_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum time of play for the selected period.
POP_UP_DIALOG.CURRENT_TIME_LIMIT_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: The current play time limit of the player for the selected period.
POP_UP_DIALOG.INCREASE_LIMIT_EXPLANATION_3: to the play time limit, and will only take effect after 7 days have elapsed.
POP_UP_DIALOG.DECREASE_LIMIT_EXPLANATION_3: to the play time limit, and will take instant effect.

CONFIRMATION_POP_UP_DIALOG.DECREASE_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to decrease play time limits
CONFIRMATION_POP_UP_DIALOG.INCREASE_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to increase play time limits

SAVE.ERROR: Play Time limit could not be saved, please try again.

SUCCESS_FORMS.PENDING_PLAY_TIME_LIMIT_REMOVED: Successfully removed pending play time limit.
SUCCESS_FORMS.ADDED_NEW_PLAY_TIME_LIMIT: Successfully added new play time limit.

WARNING_FORMS.OUT_OF_DAILY_LIMIT_WARNING: The days value can't be less than zero and more than daily limit (1 day).
WARNING_FORMS.OUT_OF_WEEKLY_LIMIT_WARNING: The days value can't be less than zero and more than daily limit (7 days).
WARNING_FORMS.OUT_OF_MONTHLY_LIMIT_WARNING: The days value can't be less than zero and more than daily limit (31 days).
WARNING_FORMS.OUT_OF_HOURS_LIMIT_WARNING: The hours value can't be less than zero and more than 24 hours.
WARNING_FORMS.OUT_OF_MINUTES_LIMIT_WARNING: The minutes value can't be less than zero and more than 60 minutes.

ERROR_FORMS.DAILY_DECREASE_HOURS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your hours and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 1d / 24h / 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.DAILY_DECREASE_DAYS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your days and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 1d / 24h / 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.DAILY_DECREASE_DAYS_ERROR: Decrease your days value to zero. Max limit: 1d / 24h / 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.WEEKLY_DECREASE_HOURS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your hours and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 7d / 6d 24h / 6d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.WEEKLY_DECREASE_DAYS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your days and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 7d / 6d 24h / 6d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.WEEKLY_DECREASE_DAYS_ERROR: Decrease your days value to zero. Max limit: 7d / 6d 24h / 6d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.MONTHLY_DECREASE_HOURS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your hours and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 31d / 30d 24h / 30d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.MONTHLY_DECREASE_DAYS_AND_MINUTES_ERROR: Decrease your days and minutes value to zero. Max limit: 31d / 30d 24h / 30d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.MONTHLY_DECREASE_DAYS_ERROR: Decrease your days value to zero. Max limit: 31d / 30d 24h / 30d 23h 60m
ERROR_FORMS.ZERO_PLAY_TIME_LIMIT_ERROR: Play Time Limit can't have zero value.
ERROR_FORMS.EQUAL_NEW_PTL_AND_CURRENT_PTL_ERROR: Play Time Limit can't be equal with current Play Time Limit.
